w: Why is life given to a man
but I will be no more
over my life in this body
but I will be no more
I could only beg my Judge
it is a matter of strength
it is a matter of justice
And even if I am righteous
Should I hold my head high
that I may have a little comfort
It will be paid in full
He will be like a vine
and the one with clean hands
Why may those who know Him
and those who dwell in them
but will do so no more
to the roofs of their mouths
am just like you before God
or put him on a leash
